events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our technical team.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering based on your experience and skills related to software development and programming.
A technical recruiter has been assigned to your case and will guide you through the next steps of the hiring process.
The initial screening call was completed successfully, and your background in software engineering matches well with the role requirements.
Thank you for confirming your availability for the technical interview; we appreciate your prompt response in the recruitment process.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for June 20th at 10 AM UTC with our lead software engineer.
You completed the technical interview and demonstrated strong problem-solving skills and proficiency in development technologies.
The HR interview has been scheduled for June 25th at 3 PM UTC to discuss your cultural fit and benefits package.
Your HR interview went positively, highlighting your alignment with company values and enthusiasm for the engineering role.
We are pleased to propose you an offer for the Software Engineer position, detailing compensation, benefits, and start date options.
You responded with positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed enthusiasm for joining the engineering team.
You have officially accepted the job offer, confirming your start date and excitement about contributing as a software engineer.
Your onboarding process has started, including access to development resources and introductions to the engineering team.
The hiring process is now closed successfully with your placement as a Software Engineer finalized and all formalities completed.
